sentences.sContent: You may be doing what could just as easily be done by someone else, which means you’re highly expendable. You may be playing follow the follower.
sentences.sContent_eng: You may be doing what could just as easily be done by someone else, which means you’re highly expendable. You may be playing follow the follower.
sentences.sCn: 你可能在做一些其他也能轻易完成的事，那可能意味着你是完全可牺牲的，你可能是追随追随者的人。

sentences.sContent: In the same way our bodies allocate blood flow away from expendable extremities in favour of vital organs during a crisis, companies must make sure their best markets and consumers are protected.
sentences.sContent_eng: In the same way our bodies allocate blood flow away from expendable extremities in favour of vital organs during a crisis, companies must make sure their best markets and consumers are protected.
sentences.sCn: 就像我们的身体在危急时刻，把血液从可以牺牲的四肢调配给致命器官的方式一样，公司必须确保其最好的市场和顾客受到保护。

synos.tran: 可消费的；排出的；不重复使用的；可牺牲的
